title: Large One Bedroom with Kitchen and Bath
posting_body: - 1 Full bath with tub/shower and recently remodeled
- Separate living room with closet for storage
- Large and modern eat in kitchen with gas range, dishwasher, disposal and refrigerator
- Small pet negotiable w/ additional deposit
- Shared rear patio in back of building
- Rent is $2,400 / month (w/ move in special 2nd month free = $2,200 effective rent for first year term)
- Verifiable income = or greater than 3x the rent
